title: Malden International Designs Mr. & Mrs. Album with Memo & Photo Opening Cover Photo Album, 160-4x6, White
description: Newlyweds can create a keepsake filled with highlights from their wedding day with this lovely photo album. The beautifully designed hardcover features the title "Mr & Mrs" stamped in a silver metallic foil. A 6-inch x 4-inch photograph easily slides in from the inside cover to showcase a favorite photo. This book-bound album is a great way to display and protect your photos as well as caption each memory with printed memo writing areas on each page. This album holds 160 4-inch x 6-inch horizontal photos and features acid-free pages that help prevent fading or discoloration. Whether standing on its own or part of a larger display on a table, this album is the perfect idea for a wedding gift. A CD storage pocket on the inside of the back cover conveniently holds 1 CD. Preserve your wedding memories with Malden International Designs wedding albums.
